channel.title: 🏢 Artificial and Natural Intelligence Toulouse Institute on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Artificial and Natural Intelligence Toulouse Institute on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Latent Representation Matters: Human-like Sketches in One-shot Drawing Tasks
item.description: AI now draws almost as well as humans, thanks to novel latent diffusion model regularizations that mimic human cognitive biases.
